thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com
thread.title: Ken M

author: Ken M
title: Ken M
text: I've purchased a few luxury pieces from Jomashop. True, they are considered grey market resellers, but I trust them more than any place for watches and luxury pens -- this includes authorized dealers. What you get in exchange for not having your name written on a purchase card is a price that cannot be beat, except perhaps for a used piece that you can find on an auction site. I don't put much faith in those places -- I have received fake merchandise there and had to get a dispute going to get my money refunded. With Jomashop, I never worry..
